definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]

sentences.english: Blame was attached upon Prime Minister Laughton's Cabinet for yielding to the Russians.
sentences.chinese: 勞頓首相的內閣因向俄國人屈服而受到責難。

sentences.english: We consult him whether Russians like golf or not.
sentences.chinese: 我們詢問他俄國人是否會喜歡高爾夫球。

sentences.english: The Russians were now heading for Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 至此，俄國人向柏林進發。

sentences.english: He quickly interpreted to me what the Russian was saying.
sentences.chinese: 他把那個俄國人說的話很快地譯給我聽。

sentences.english: The Russians refer to garlic as Russian penicillin.
sentences.chinese: 俄國人將大蒜視爲俄羅斯青黴素。

sentences.english: To Romanians Russia is a predator .
sentences.chinese: 而對羅馬尼亞人而言，俄國人則是掠奪者。

sentences.english: Every time they hear a few Russian felt boots swishing in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 他們不過聽到幾個俄國人靴子在雪地上的吱吱聲。

sentences.english: The Russians retreated before the invaders, tempting them to stretch their supply lines.
sentences.chinese: 俄國人在入侵者之前撤退，引誘他們延長補給線。

sentences.english: In Russia, they fight with the non- Muslim Russians.
sentences.chinese: 在俄國，他們和非穆斯林俄國人戰鬥。

sentences.english: At present the only exit that the Russians had was Murmansk.
sentences.chinese: 目前俄國人唯一的出海口就是摩爾曼斯克。

sentences.english: Russian public opinion polls still rank him near the top of the greatest leaders of Russian history, as if he were just another powerful but bloodthirsty czar.
sentences.chinese: 民調顯示，在俄國人心中他幾乎是最偉大的領導人。

sentences.english: We need to strike fast before the Russians can launch a counter-attack.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要搶在俄國人反擊之前發動突襲。

sentences.english: Soon another argument was being made for the Amur.
sentences.chinese: 不久，俄國人有了“黑龍江計劃”的第二個理由。

sentences.english: The Russians had not succeeded in imposing monetary discipline on themselves.
sentences.chinese: 俄國人卻沒能達成貨幣制度強加在自己身上。

sentences.english: In 10 days I'll have us a war with the son of a bitch, .
sentences.chinese: 在10天內，我就會和那些狗孃養的俄國人開戰，。

sentences.english: Russians rediscovered a river that for centuries had hung forgotten off the eastern edge of their realm, flowing through empty Chinese lands.
sentences.chinese: 俄國人重新發現了東部邊際一條被遺忘了幾百年的河。

definition: Treaty of Shimonoseki (1895), concluding the First Sino-Japanese War 甲午戰爭|甲午战争[Jia3 wu3 Zhan4 zheng1]
Taroko, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
fire of war everywhere (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms

pinyin: Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
